channel.title: CVE Feed for I Thirteen Web Solution -- Easy Testimonial Slider and Form
channel.description: The latest CVEs for I Thirteen Web Solution -- Easy Testimonial Slider and Form

item.title: CVE-2023-45754|2024-08-02T20:29:31.636Z -- i%20thirteen%20web%20solution -- easy%20testimonial%20slider%20and%20form
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in I Thirteen Web Solution Easy Testimonial Slider and Form allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy Testimonial Slider and Form: from n/a through 1.0.18.
